name: Life Stories
description: The user can share their story to encourage another. In this app I use Mern, MongoDB as a backend use Graphql to connect react with the help of Apollo client. For authentication used JWT to create a token.

name: Updated Portfolio Page 2
description: I used a combination of HTML, Css, Bootstrap 4 and Java Script. I also created greyscale, hover zoom out and a video called thank you for watching. For all the icons, I used vscode rextention React icons

name: Password Manager
description: For Password Manager as a group of four, we used Node.js, Express.js, Handlebars.js. We also used MySQL and the Sequelize ORM for the database. Finally, AES to encrypt and decrypt, MD5 Hashing & Bcryp

name: Social Network API
description: This is a backend, it allows users to share their thoughts, this allows others to react to a friend's thought and add a friend that uses a NoSQL database. For the database I used MongoDB and Mongoose.

name: Employee Tracker
description: This app is content management system (CMS) to manage a company's employee database. A command-line application to manage a company's database, using Node.js, Inquirer and MySQL.

name: BCKS Project
description: As a group of four, we created Currency Convertor, Cost of living while you travel, Current see and Cat and Dog. We use HTML, Css and Java Script. We also used API to get the data from the third party
